mapper.select: SELECT SEQ AS seq ,NAME AS name ,EMAIL AS email ,PHONE AS phone ,POSITION AS position ,DETAIL AS detail ,PASSWORD AS password ,FILE_NM AS fileNm ,ORG_FILE_NM AS orgFileNM ,FILE_PATH AS filePath ,CREATE_DT AS createDt FROM REQUEST ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST (NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, POSITION, DETAIL, PASSWORD, CREATE_DT) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{detail}, #{password}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM REQUEST

SELECT SEQ AS seq ,NAME AS name ,EMAIL AS email ,PHONE AS phone ,POSITION AS position ,DETAIL AS detail ,PASSWORD AS password ,FILE_NM AS fileNm ,ORG_FILE_NM AS orgFileNm ,FILE_PATH AS filePath ,CREATE_DT AS createDt FROM REQUEST WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
